title: Tropical Tevelev degrees
abstract:
We define the tropical Tevelev degrees, $\mathsf{Tev}_g^{trop}$, as the
degree of a natural finite morphism between certain tropical moduli spaces, in
analogy to the algebraic case. We develop an explicit combinatorial
construction that computes $\mathsf{Tev}_g^{trop} = 2^g$. We prove that these
tropical enumerative invariants agree with their algebraic counterparts, giving
an independent tropical computation of the algebraic degrees $Tev_g$.
